::Battera::

She nodded to him. "He is very special." She stared at the wall past 
Rex.  She remembered how he so easily forgave her for her cowardly 
actions. She spoke in a low and soft voice, "Special indeed." as she 
kept staring at the wall.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex nods, frowning. If the Matrix sent back a Pred, there must be 
something 
> special about him.
> 
> "Hmm," he says, grabbing another fruit, "So he's not a typical 
Pred?"
